CRS_CODE: The code assigned to each course. DataType: varchar
DEPT_CODE: The code assigned to the department offering the course. DataType: varchar
CRS_DESCRIPTION: The description of the course. DataType: varchar
CRS_CREDIT: The number of credits assigned to the course. DataType: float
table_explanation: This table contains information about different courses. It includes the course code, department code, course description, and the number of credits assigned to each course.
